topic.title: Host site without all files downloaded or seeded
topic.body: If I had a site where I was sharing a lot of videos, I want to create a directory that contains those videos and I want them to only be loaded if the user clicks on them. Can there be a way to make a separate content.json for directories, so that they aren't loaded with the rest of the site, and have separate seeders, etc? I could create a site for each video or couple of videos, and serve links on the main site, but a directory system would be a much better design.
